---
title: "r-exploring"
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)

```

Exploring

```{r}
names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)
```

```{r}
ggpairs(diamonds)
```

Basic ggplot

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = price, y = carat)) + geom_point()
```

Histogram

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) + geom_histogram()
```
